detail_desc: Sleeveless top in woven fabric with covered elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow, and a narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with a peplum.
Set with a dress and tights. Flared dress in stretch organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and frills on the shoulders. Tights in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Set with a soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners. Briefs with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a terry anchor motif on the front, long raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Cardigan in a fine rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and open front pockets.
Calf-length skirt in lace with a concealed zip and a slit at the back, and contrasting colour lining.
Long dress in an airy patterned weave. Double layer at the top, short sleeves with slits, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a seam at the waist. Lined.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Double-layered hats in organic cotton jersey.
Satin dressing gown with concealed ties at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with contrasting colour trims.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved jumper in soft, purl-knit organic cotton with a button placket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.

Short-sleeved, calf-length dress in mesh with sequins and embroidered text. Opening and button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Short jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Push-up bras in soft cotton jersey with lace. Underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Cropped jumper in a soft, rib knit with long sleeves and wrapover ribbing at the hem.
Jersey T-shirt in an cotton blend.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Small handbag in grained imitation leather with a handle, zip at the top and a detachable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 4.5 cm. Height 14 cm. Width 25 cm.
Straight-cut, knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and front pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, one-shoulder top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with quilted details, zips in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama shorts in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Long dress in softly draping satin with short, flounced sleeves and an opening at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the neckline. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt with gathers and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short, fitted one-shoulder dress in stretch jersey with a large puffy flounce in crisp cotton poplin at the top and a gathered seam at one side for a gentle draped effect.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Sleeveless dress in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flared skirt.
Boots with warm faux fur linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket, slightly lower crotch and wide legs.
Short, boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long, circular skirt in a woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with a zip and button at one side.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Baseball shirt in soft jersey with 3/4-length raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and a rounded hem.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Patterned, fine-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Empire-line dress in soft cotton jersey with two layers of tulle on top and a shimmering metallic print. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and flutter sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Long satin dress with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam with a tie at the waist and a draped, asymmetric skirt with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs and lengths, two with bead-shaped pendants.
Bolero and dress in cotton. Bolero in a fine knit with long sleeves and a faceted, heart-shaped button at the top. Sleeveless jersey dress with gathers and elastication at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed denim with a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Bikini briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Set with a hat and mittens in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Hat with a faux fur pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing. Both hat and mittens have a fleece lining.
Jumper in an airy, fine-knit Tencel™ lyocell and wool blend with a turtle neck at the front and a V-shaped opening with wide ties at the back. Roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Short, A-line skirt with a zip at the back and flounce at the hem.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck, button placket and butterfly sleeves.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with decorated, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool decorated with faceted, plastic sparkly stones on the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, a double-layered drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Long-sleeved sports top in thermal, marled functional fabric with a stand-up collar and a zip at the top with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shopper in soft grained imitation leather with two handles at the top made of metal chain and imitation leather. Magnetic press-stud fastening and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size 13x32x33 cm.
Fitted blouse in soft imitation leather with a collar and press-studs down the front. Long puff sleeves, a discreet press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Socks in a soft rib knit containing some mohair.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, front and back pockets and skinny legs.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with hole pattern details and long raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, short sleeves and high slits in the sides.
